targets.query:
from(bucket: "ruby_test")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] == "publisher" or r["container_name"] == "subscriber1" or r["container_name"] == "subscriber2" or r["container_name"] == "railstash" or r["container_name"] == "elasticsearch" or r["container_name"] == "logstash" or r["container_name"] == "kibana"    )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_percent")

from(bucket: "ruby_test")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] == "publisher" or r["container_name"] == "subscriber1" or r["container_name"] == "subscriber2" or r["container_name"] == "railstash" or r["container_name"] == "elasticsearch" or r["container_name"] == "logstash" or r["container_name"] == "kibana"    )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_percent")

from(bucket: "ruby_test")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_blkio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] == "publisher" or r["container_name"] == "subscriber1" or r["container_name"] == "subscriber2" or r["container_name"] == "logstash")

from(bucket: "ruby_test")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["container_name"] == "railstash")
